summary: Implements a publicly visible homepage “dashboard” section by introducing a reusable `SubmissionsDashboard` component and embedding it in `HomePage`, plus adds a header navigation button labeled exactly “dashboard” that scrolls to the section. No evidence in the provided diff summary that the protected `/dashboard` admin access control was modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to project tracking/metadata state file (`project_state.json`) that are not part of the requested homepage dashboard rendering or navigation affordance.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements only mention rendering the dashboard on the homepage and adding in-page navigation; no request to modify project metadata/state files.
